title: Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw for Sports and Travel, BPA-Free, 32oz, Dreamy Field
descriptions:
Meet the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle (32 oz) in the Dreamy Field color. It keeps your water cold for up to 24 hours and is simple to use, even if you prefer straightforward, no-fuss products.

Easy to drink
- Two ways to sip: use the built‑in straw for small, gentle sips, or tilt the bottle and drink from the wider opening for a bigger swig.
- Large opening makes it easy to add ice cubes.

Simple, safe lid
- Push the button to open the lid. Close it to keep it clean.
- Slide the lock to prevent spills in a bag or car.
- The carry loop makes it easy to hold and also works as a lock.

Comfortable to carry
- The sturdy loop helps you carry the bottle with one or two fingers.
- Fits everyday life: walks, exercise, appointments, and travel.

Keeps drinks cold
- Double‑wall stainless steel keeps water cold up to 24 hours.
- No sweat on the outside, so your hands and bags stay dry.

Easy to clean
- Bottle: hand wash.
- Lid: top‑rack dishwasher safe.

Safe materials
- BPA‑free and phthalate‑free.

Important note
- Not for hot liquids.

Options and support
- Also available in 24‑ounce and 40‑ounce sizes.
- Backed by a limited lifetime warranty.

In short: press to open, sip or swig, lock to prevent spills, and enjoy cold water all day in a sturdy, easy‑to‑carry bottle.
